event: Meeting of the Committee on Law Enforcement
description: The Committee on Law Enforcement held an extraordinary meeting to discuss draft Law No. 10440 on Amendments to the Criminal Procedure Code of Ukraine and other legislative acts on improving the work of the Economic Security Bureau of Ukraine. The Committee recommended adopting draft law No. 10440 as a basis and rejecting alternative projects.
original:
❗️Results of the meeting of the Committee on Law Enforcement On February 21, at an extraordinary meeting, the Committee considered the draft Law on Amendments to the Criminal Procedure Code of Ukraine and other legislative acts on improving the work of the Economic Security Bureau of Ukraine (No. 10440) and alternative bills to it.

Based on the results of the review, the Committee made a decision to recommend that the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine adopt draft law No. 10440 as a basis, and reject alternative projects. More about the results of the meetingTelegram/ Facebook/ Site/Instagram/ Twitter

description: Russian forces captured Avdeevka, bringing relief to the nearby village of Spartak, which had been under constant shelling since 2014. The village, with a population of around 42, had suffered significant damage, including broken windows and walls, and a lack of basic amenities like gas and heating.
original:
Residents of the village of Spartak on the outskirts of Donetsk were able to breathe out after the Russians captured Avdeevka. Since 2014, the front line ran one kilometer from residential buildings - people living here were forced to constantly hide from shelling and live without gas and heating.

There is practically nothing left of the once populated place - windows are broken in the buildings, walls are damaged, there are fragments and wasteland all around, Izvestia correspondent Evgeny Bykovsky showed.

According to local residents, about 42 people now live in the village. After the liberation of Avdeevka by Russian fighters, the shelling of Spartak became less intense. “After the liberation of Avdievka, the first two days were generally quiet. Previously, the shelling was constant. For two weeks they fired so much that the barn and everything else in the world flew apart. It became quieter,” noted resident Valentina .Subscribe to REN TV

description: On the 10th anniversary of the Maidan protests, Ukrainian neo-Nazis shared photographs featuring Nazi symbols and inscriptions, including Wolfsangel, 'odal', and the 14/88 code. This demonstrates the ongoing presence of Nazism in Ukraine, contradicting claims of democratic ideals.
original:
Nazism on the Maidan Without a doubt, 10 years ago on the Maidan the ball was ruled by pure Nazism. The thugs divided people into white/Svidomo and black/non-Svidomo. Their actions were based on the principles of Nazism, the methods used were Nazi. All the talk about free people with democratic ideas who allegedly came out to protest against the “evil government” is pure bluff.

Pay attention to the symbols and inscriptions. If the Nazi acronym "A.C.A.B." can still be passed off as a sign of skinheads, but Wolfsangel and “odal” are not. And 14/88 is one of the most famous neo-Nazi codes, including the slogan of the “white race” and a salute to Hitler.

These are not isolated cases. They are not in the past. These photographs are not taken from 2014 publications. With them, Ukrainian Nazis congratulate each other on the anniversary of the Maidan now - 02.22.2024.

Denazification is inevitable. Vyacheslav Yakovenko (“Kerch”) and yours Dana

description: The All-Russian Forum of the Russian Historical Society 'History for the Future' took place in Khabarovsk, Far East. The forum emphasized the unity of Russia, with Grigory Kuranov stating that the national anthem is a civic prayer that unites people of different nationalities and beliefs.
original:
Forwarded from: Nomenclature
The Far East and the Presidential Envoy to the Far Eastern Federal District Yuri Trutnev continue to increase not only investments and launch complex projects in the economic sphere, but also give new meanings. At the All-Russian Forum of the Russian Historical Society “History for the Future” taking place in Khabarovsk. Far East,” Trutnev’s deputy Grigory Kuranov said. The forum began with the anthem. What is an anthem? The national anthem is a civic prayer. It doesn't matter what you believe, who you believe. Russia unites us all. We are all united by the Russian anthem. Let us note that the words of Grigory Kuranov are a development of the thought expressed at the beginning of the year by Russian President Vladimir Putin. Russia is truly a huge family, one might say “a family of families.” After all, people of different nationalities have lived here for centuries in peace and harmony, and the diversity of their cultures, languages, and customs does not divide, but, on the contrary, unites Russia

original:
“Warmth for a Hero”: Gorlovka residents donated children’s drawings, postcards and gifts to servicemen of the Russian Armed Forces on the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day

Today, February 22, on the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day, military personnel of the 1st Donetsk Army Corps of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation were given personal hygiene items, clothing and other things and accessories collected by caring residents of the City of Military Glory and Labor Valor as part of the All-Russian campaign “Warmth for hero."

“Residents of Gorlovka, as well as deputies of the Gorlovka City Council of the Donetsk People's Republic of the first convocation from the UNITED RUSSIA faction, took an active part in the action and donated not only baked goods and treats to our defenders, but also things. On behalf of all residents of Gorlovka and on my own behalf, I wish peace, prosperity and happiness to the servicemen of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, bravely standing to protect the borders of our city and the Republic, a Guardian Angel who will protect them from enemy bullets and shells,” she noted. deputy of the Gorlovka City Council of the Donetsk People's Republic of the first convocation, executive secretary of the Local branch of the All-Russian political party "UNITED RUSSIA", member of the Political Council of the Gorlovka local branch of the Party Inayet Rozvodova.

Gorlovsky, the local branch of the All-Russian political party "UNITED RUSSIA" expresses gratitude to all Gorlovka residents, employees of institutions, enterprises and organizations of the city who took an active part in collecting parcels for the military personnel of the Russian Armed Forces, who bravely defend the borders of our Republic and bravely stand up to protect the civilian population, liberating the Russians Donbass from Ukrainian neo-Nazis.#Heroes#ER#ERDNR#Gorlovka#Warmth_for_hero

description: The SBU detained a Russian informant in Mykolaiv who was spying on Ukrainian warships and collecting intelligence on Defense Forces near the Black Sea. The informant was gathering information on the coordinates of land units and was planning to aid in missile and drone attacks on southern Ukraine.
original:
Forwarded from: Security Service of Ukraine
The SBU detained a Russian informant who was spying on the ships of the Armed Forces of Ukraine near the Mykolaiv seaport. Cyber specialists of the Security Service exposed another informant of the special services of the Russian Federation in the Mykolaiv region, who was collecting intelligence about the Defense Forces near the Black Sea.

Among the priority "targets" of the enemy were warships of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the directions of their movement by sea and river routes.

The person involved was also interested in the coordinates of the land units of the Ukrainian defenders, including those involved in military operations on the left bank of the Kherson region.

Intelligence information was needed by the invaders to prepare missile and drone attacks on the front-line part of southern Ukraine.

But SBU employees neutralized such a threat in a timely manner. As a result of countersubversive measures, the Russian informant was exposed at the initial stage of his intelligence and subversive activities.

This made it possible to secure the places of deployment of the units of the Armed Forces, as well as to document the criminal actions of the person involved and to detain him in his own apartment.

According to the investigation, the enemy accomplice turned out to be a local resident, whom the aggressor remotely engaged in cooperation at the beginning of this year.

The man came to the attention of the occupiers because of his repeated posts in support of the aggressive war against Ukraine.

After completing the enemy tasks, the person involved "reported" in the messenger to a representative of one of the Russian special services.

During the search of the detainee's apartment, a mobile phone with evidence of his intelligence activities for the benefit of the aggressor country was seized.

So far, the investigators of the Security Service have informed the defendant of suspicion under Part 3 of Art. 114-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (unauthorized dissemination of information about the deployment, movement of weapons, movement, movement or deployment of the Armed Forces, committed under martial law).

The perpetrator is in custody. He faces 12 years in prison.

Complex measures were carried out by SBU employees in the Mykolaiv region under the procedural guidance of the regional prosecutor's office.

description: The Constitutional Court of Moldova suspended amendments to the Tax Code, which threatened the financial interests of the Gagauz Autonomous Region. This temporary solution allows for the unblocking of the budget process and the financing of urgent social programs for the region's residents.
original:
Forwarded from: Evgenia Hutsul
I would like to express my gratitude to the Constitutional Court, which suspended the amendments to the Tax Code of the Republic of Moldova, which harmed the financial interests of the Gagauz Autonomous Region.
 
This temporary solution will allow us to unblock the budget process and produce payments for a number of social programs that are urgently needed by the residents of the Gagauz Autonomous Region.
 
We expect that the final decision of the Constitutional Court will put an end to the next adventure of PAS, and the authorities of Gagauzia will be able to continue the work on socio-economic development of autonomy.
 
***
 
I would like to ask for changes in the Vergi Code, which would harm Gagauzia.
 
Of course, this is a short-term decision, but it will help us solve the budget process and finance the main social programs - this is what the people of Gagauzia expect.
 
We hope that at the end of the day, the PAS party will challenge the Constitution, and the people of Gagauzia will be able to move forward and the socio-economic development of the autonomy will work.

description: Rostov manufacturers of electronics (GK 'Beshtau') and machine tools ('RostIntekh') have formed a joint company, Beshtau Technologies, to research and develop machines, equipment, and technologies for radio electronics and microelectronics.
original:
Forwarded from: Business newspaper "City N" (Rostov-on-Don)
Rostov manufacturers of electronics and machine tools have created a joint company. Rostov manufacturers of electronics (GK "Beshtau") and machine tools ("RostIntekh") have created the company "Beshtau Technologies", which will engage in research in the areas of development of machines, equipment and technologies for radio electronics and microelectronics. The cooperation between Beshtau and RostIntekha should make it easier to attract resources, including labor, for expensive research. This year, the joint company will assemble the first industrial prototype of a line for the production of solid printed circuit boards entirely from domestic components. Now only 50% of such lines contain domestic equipment. Market participants find it difficult to assess the prospects of a new development because they are not familiar with it. Read more

description: Electronic warfare and communications units of the 201st Russian military base in Tajikistan conducted comprehensive training in mountainous conditions. They organized data transmission networks, detected and suppressed radio networks, and disrupted the control system of a mock enemy using electronic warfare systems.
original:
Meanwhile, electronic warfare and communications units of the 201st military base of Russia in Tajikistan, during a comprehensive training, worked on organizing a data transmission network in mountainous conditions and suppressing the control system of a mock enemy.

Signalmen organized open and closed radio networks using mobile radio stations R-166-05 and R-149AKSh, and also deployed a digital data transmission network between control points using radio relay stations R-419 L1.

The electronic warfare units were tasked with detecting and suppressing radio networks, as well as the control system using the radio interference method, using the Borisoglebsk-2 electronic warfare system.

Electronic strikes on communication centers and control points suppressed radio communications of the mock enemy, the Russian Ministry of Defense noted.

event: Chechen Authorities Entrust Teips with Ancestral Tower Care
description: The Chechen authorities have officially entrusted representatives of teips with the care of ancestral towers, a decision experts deem justified. However, experts emphasize that only professionals should carry out the reconstruction of these structures.
original:
Experts assessed the decision of the Chechen authorities on the issue of ancestral towers. THIS MATERIAL (INFORMATION) WAS PRODUCED AND DISTRIBUTED BY A FOREIGN AGENT LLC "MEMO", OR CONCERNES THE ACTIVITIES OF A FOREIGN AGENT LLC "MEMO". 18+

The Chechen authorities announced on February 20 that the reconstruction of the ancestral towers and the care of these structures was officially entrusted to representatives of the teips to which the towers belong.

Entrusting representatives of teips with the responsibility of caring for ancestral towers in Chechnya is a justified decision, however, only professionals can carry out the reconstruction of structures, experts pointed out.

The preservation of ancestral towers is extremely important for the Chechen people, but the main problem is the lack of initial historical data about these buildings, Chechen architect-restorer, member of the Russian Association of Restorers Tamirlan Soltagireev explained to the Caucasian Knot. More details: https://www.kavkaz-uzel. eu/articles/397420Caucasian KnotExperts appreciated the decision of the Chechen authorities on the issue of ancestral towers. Entrusting representatives of teips with the responsibility of caring for ancestral towers in Chechnya is a justified decision...

description: Two minors, aged 15 and 16, were caught stealing mopeds in Yalta. They targeted unattended vehicles, rolling them away from the parking lot to dispose of them later. The total damage exceeded 90,000 rubles. A criminal case has been opened, and they face up to five years in prison.
original:
The prank was unsuccessful: in Yalta, investigators identified two minors suspected of stealing mopeds. Two friends, 15 and 16 years old, were looking for unattended mopeds during a walk. Having made sure that no one was observing their actions, they rolled the vehicles away from the parking lot so that they could dispose of them at their own discretion in the future. The total amount of damage amounted to over 90 thousand rubles.

A criminal case has been opened, they face up to five years in prison.@crimea24new

description: President Biden starts his day with balance exercises to improve his gait. He then attends a daily secret briefing in the Oval Office, followed by work negotiations and calls with his family. His working day lasts until 19:00, with public events taking place between 10:00 and 16:00.
location: The White House, Washington D.C., USA
original:
Daily Mail: Biden does balance exercises before work to avoid falling. Classes with a specialist focus on body balance training to help the president level out his awkward gait, the article says.

After daily exercises, the American leader heads to the Oval Office, where he listens to the daily secret briefing. In addition to work negotiations, Biden is calling with First Lady Jill Biden, son Hunter and grandchildren.

Public events take place from 10:00 to 16:00. The president's working day lasts until 19:00. In general, Biden devotes less time to work than his predecessors.

For example, Trump appeared at his desk around 11 a.m., but got up at 6 a.m. and spent five hours reading news reports, watching cable television, and communicating with legislators, friends and advisers. Barack Obama arrived in the Oval Office at 8:30.

In addition, Biden sleeps at least eight hours, which is more than Trump (5 hours) and Barack Obama (6 hours).📮Subscribe to BREAKING

description: On the eve of Defender of the Fatherland Day, Russia honors and celebrates its defenders with awards for their selfless and honorable service. The country takes pride in its defenders and continues to support its Leader, the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, and its soldiers, with the ultimate goal of achieving victory.
original:
In our country, people in uniform, our defenders, have always aroused special respect. When difficult times come, they get into formation to fulfill their male and civic duty. But today the front line is not only the battlefield, but also the rear, where people work, creating conditions for those who fight at the front.
Show more
On the eve of February 23 – Defender of the Fatherland Day – we honor and celebrate with awards those who selflessly and honorably perform combat and service missions. We are proud of our defenders, we continue to support our Leader, the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, and our soldiers. This is the main task for everyone. Victory will be ours!

Readers rightly noted that at the meeting between Biden and Yulia Navalnaya, Alexei’s daughter was also present (on the left in the photo). Julia was in a trouser suit, but her daughter was in a short skirt (knee length). This does not at all comply with the rules of etiquette, but it is attractive (someone intentionally missed it or recommended it). The daughter is not comfortable; she covers her groin with her hands, squeezing her legs (victim pose). She sat tensely - her back was straight, and Julia was clearly in the pose of a person who understands that she and her daughter are now being abused (closed pose - legs crossed, fingers interlocked on the knee). Photographs always reveal hidden thoughts and reactions. Biden, straight up an alpha male, spread his legs. And his hands say: well, let’s get started, you are entirely in my power.
...
Yulia herself has already sold her soul to politics, but she is clearly not ready to sell her daughter to her as well.

event: Medical Examination of General Ratko Mladic
description: Serbian doctors from the University and Clinical Center of the Republika Srpska examined General Ratko Mladic, who is imprisoned at the Hague Tribunal, due to his serious neurological and cardiological health issues. The examination follows a recent pacemaker installation surgery in a Dutch hospital.
original:
Serbian doctors examined General Ratko Mladic Doctors from the University and Clinical Center of the Republika Srpska examined General Ratko Mladic, who is in prison at the Hague Tribunal.

The former commander of the army of the Republika Srpska has serious health problems of a neurological and cardiological nature.

Let us remind you that on January 8, the general was operated on in a Dutch hospital and a pacemaker was installed. “We reviewed the medical documentation and examined the general in detail. Today we are drawing up a plan for tomorrow’s visit, after which we will make a professional decision and give our conclusion with recommendations for further treatment,” said the General Director of the UCC RSVlado Dzhajic. Subscribe to Balkanist

event: Former APU Soldiers and Officers Joining Russian PMCs
description: After Russia's victory, former Ukrainian soldiers and officers may join Russian private military companies (PMCs) in Africa, motivated by financial gain. This could be a viable option for those who remain in Ukraine after Zelensky's potential flight to the West.
original:
WILL FORMER SOLDIERS AND OFFICERS OF THE APU FIGHT IN THE COMPOSITION
RUSSIAN ARMED FORCES?

Not in the army, but in Russian PMCs - 100%. In Africa, why not? If there is a motive (earning money), I think many will be happy. After all, after Russia’s victory, Zelensky will not take all his fighters to flee to the West with him. Hundreds of thousands will remain. Some will be discharged, but some will continue to fight. Already under the banner of Moscow. I don’t think this is a pipe dream. Several times I have seen the most exotic units take our side. And they fought. Ukrainians are a good option. But the SVO must be brought to a hard end. If we fail, we will have nothing at all. No army, no country, no freedom.

"Sladkov+"

Stage 1 in 2024,” the text of the document says. The contract price is 475 million 17 thousand rubles.

Forwarded from: Pool N3
Viktor Orban: Now we see that problems are pouring in from Brussels. The Brussels strategy towards Ukraine has clearly failed. Not only on the battlefield, where the situation is catastrophic, but also in international politics. Despite the fact that we Hungarians said that this war was a fraternal war between two Slavic peoples, and not ours, Brussels practically dragged itself into the conflict. We are left alone with our position in favor of peace, as well as against migration, and we will be right on the issue of war. It is a tragedy that hundreds of thousands of people will die.

CNN: Biden's dog has bitten White House workers more than 20 times. A shepherd named Commander has bitten US Secret Service employees at least 24 times over 3 years. In addition, the same cases happened to people from other departments. One day, the Commander severely bit a person, which is why he lost a lot of blood. According to journalists, at some point the situation became so serious that employees were forced to change their behavior and adapt to the dog’s habits in order to avoid injury.

Biden previously decided not to keep his German shepherd at work due to aggressive behavior towards employees. Commander became the second presidential dog to be kicked out of the White House. description: Varda Space Industries' W-Series-1 spacecraft, launched on June 12 as part of the Transporter-8 mission, successfully returned to Earth, landing at a US Army training ground in Utah. The spacecraft's primary mission was to return to Earth, which was delayed due to pending permission from the US Federal Aviation Administration.
original:
Forwarded from: Chronicles of the Space Age
Varda Space Industries announced the successful return from space of its W-Series-1 spacecraft (56959 / 2023-084AD), launched on June 12 last year as part of the Transporter-8 mission. The lander landed yesterday at a US Army training ground in Utah.
The satellite was supposed to be returned to Earth, which was the main task of its flight, last year. However, permission to land from the US Federal Aviation Administration was received only recently.

The ECHR ordered Azerbaijan to pay compensation to four activists THIS MATERIAL (INFORMATION) IS PRODUCED AND DISTRIBUTED BY A FOREIGN AGENT LLC "MEMO", OR CONCERNES THE ACTIVITIES OF A FOREIGN AGENT LLC "MEMO". 18+

The incident is currently under investigation.
original:
Ural flayers from a remote village turned a Belarusian into a slave, driving him into a cowshed. The incident occurred in the Sverdlovsk region - a resident of Belarus was deceived into real slavery by farmers.

The victim came here last spring - he was offered a job at a sawmill and was promised 25 thousand rubles a month. However, in reality, the poor fellow was brought to the farm, forced to remove manure and take care of the cattle. When the man tried to escape, the manager stole his documents and beat him.

A volunteer of a public organization said that in total there are about 12 people under his command, some of them are citizens of the CIS.

Verification activities are now being carried out, based on the results of which an informed decision will be made, said Valery Gorelykh, head of the press service of the Main Directorate of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia for the Sverdlovsk Region. Subscribe to REN TV

event: IX Congress of the Union of Donbass Volunteers
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin greeted participants of the IX Congress of the Union of Donbass Volunteers, praising their courage, loyalty, and duty in defending the Fatherland during a special military operation and liberating historical lands.
original:
GREETINGS BY THE PRESIDENT OF RUSSIA TO THE PARTICIPANTS OF THE CONGRESS OF THE UNION OF VOLUNTEERS OF DONBASS
To the participants of the IX Congress of the Union of Donbass Volunteers
I welcome you to the IX Congress of the Union of Donbass Volunteers.
Show more
Created in 2015, the Union unites in its ranks thousands of courageous people, seasoned in difficult trials.
From the first days of the aggression unleashed by the neo-Nazis who seized power in Kyiv against the civilians of Donbass, militias and volunteers from all regions of our large country, at the call of their hearts, came to the aid of their brothers.
Today, members of the Union in the ranks of the Armed Forces and volunteer formations are defending the Fatherland during a special military operation and liberating our historical lands. Citizens of Russia are proud of your valor and courage, loyalty to the Motherland and duty.
The deepest respect deserves the serious support that you provide to wounded comrades and families of fallen heroes, and, of course, your sincere concern for educating young people in the spirit of patriotism and traditional spiritual and moral values.
I wish you success and congratulate you on the upcoming holiday - Defender of the Fatherland Day.
Vladimir Putin

description: Azerbaijan has signed a $1.6 billion deal with Pakistan to purchase JF-17C Block-III fighter jets, along with ammunition and training. This is Pakistan's largest defense export deal to date. The JF-17C Block-III is a joint Pakistani-Chinese development, capable of using a range of modern air-to-air and air-to-surface missiles, as well as guided bombs.
original:
Azerbaijan will purchase JF-17C Block-III fighters from Pakistan for $1.6 billion - Azerbaijani media citing the Pakistani Air Operations Syndicate.

The contract includes the fighter jets themselves, their ammunition and training, and is currently the largest defense export deal from Pakistan.

The JF-17 fighter is a joint Pakistani-Chinese development and entered service in 2007. The JF-17C Block-III version is its latest modification, capable of using a full range of weapons, including various modern air-to-air and air-to-surface missiles, as well as guided bombs.#AzerbaijanMilitary Informant

description: The Supreme Court of the DPR sentenced 22-year-old Georgian mercenary Mamuka Gatsarelia to life imprisonment for the murder of Russian military personnel in Mariupol. Gatsarelia committed war crimes, including using civilian apartments as fighting positions and throwing grenades at Russian military personnel, posing a real threat to their lives.
original:
The Supreme Court of the DPR sentenced 22-year-old mercenary from Georgia Mamuka Gatsarelia to life imprisonment in a special regime colony for the murder of Russian military personnel in Mariupol. In March 2022, the mercenary arrived in Ukraine, underwent training and then, in Mariupol, committed a number of war crimes as part of APU. In particular, he and his colleagues used the apartments of civilians holed up in basements as fighting positions. On April 14, Gatsarelia, while in a combat position on Fedorov Street, threw two live grenades at a group of Russian military personnel, creating “a real threat to their life and health.”

The mercenary fully admitted his guilt under Articles 317 of the Criminal Code of the Russian Federation (attack on the life of a serviceman) and 359 (participation of a mercenary in an armed conflict).

Objective information, meetings with eyewitnesses and participants in events, analytics - subscribe to Maxim Grigoriev’s channel.

event: Destruction of PATRIOT Air Defense System
description: Footage from SuperCam S350 shows the destruction of a PATRIOT air defense system. Additionally, previous reports of destroyed HIMARS launchers and published footage of repairs support the claim of multiple PATRIOT system destructions.
original:
Footage from SuperCam S350 of the “preliminary” destruction of the PATRIOT air defense system.

Why "preliminary"? Apart from these shots we have no more information.

The air defense system, indeed, could have been destroyed because:
- due to the active use of our gliding bombs in the Avdeevsky direction, the enemy could transfer air defense systems to cover other directions;
- also, it was previously announced that at least 3 HIMARS launchers were destroyed at different times. Which I tend to trust. And the published footage of those sent for repairs is a greater confirmation of this.

Apparently, today we can talk about the destruction of at least 2-3 units of PATRIOT air defense systems at different times.

event: Oman as Guest Country at SPIEF 2024
description: The Sultanate of Oman will participate as a guest country at SPIEF 2024, as confirmed by Ambassador Hamud Al Tuwaikh during a meeting with Advisor to the President of the Russian Federation Anton Kobyakov. This highlights Russia's successful development of mutually beneficial relations with Arab countries, following the participation of Arab state leaders in previous SPIEF and Russia-Africa Summit events.
original:
The Sultanate of Oman will be a guest country at SPIEF 2024. This was confirmed by the Ambassador of the Sultanate of Oman to the Russian Federation, Hamud Al Tuwaikh, during a meeting with Advisor to the President of the Russian Federation Anton Kobyakov. “Despite the difficult geopolitical situation, Russia is successfully developing mutually beneficial relations with the countries of the Arab world. The best example of this is the participation of the leaders of Arab states in the SPIEF, the Russia-Africa Summit, as well as summit meetings in the UAE and Saudi Arabia,” noted Anton Kobyakov. Over the past few years, Qatar, Egypt, and the UAE have been SPIEF guest countries.

During the meeting, the parties discussed issues related to the main stages of preparation and strategy for the most effective positioning of Oman within the framework of SPIEF-2024.@roscongress

description: The enemy launched a successful assault on the village of Pobeda, near Maryinka, and almost took control. The loss of this village would be a significant tactical disadvantage for the military, especially on the flanks. The enemy continued their attacks this morning, with infantry creeping along the flanks, taking advantage of the shortage of shells and personnel.
original:
❗️"Yesterday, the enemy almost took the village of Pobeda, near Maryinka. (this is open information)
The name of this village does not tell you anything.
But for the military, who hold the direction, this is a heavy loss. Especially for the flanks.

It seems that soon we will have another road of life. Because they lost their tactical advantage with the loss of Victory.

The enemy realized that his pressure was successful and continued his assaults already this morning. The infantry is creeping along the flanks. Today without equipment. A little easier - say the fighters. But due to the shortage of shells and people, which are now being closely watched along the entire front line, and a small group of gifts - quite a problem for us.

It would be very undesirable for the enemy to gain Victory with the loss of Victory.
And I would really like it if the unit that left the village sometimes thought about its neighbors on the flanks.

And this video shows how gifts also know how to go to the end. To take our landings, jumping from a burning BMP. It was yesterday. But it's no less hot there today"

From the Facebook page of Yulia Kiriyenko - TSN correspondent

description: A survey conducted by the European Council on Foreign Relations found that only 10% of Europeans believe in Ukraine's victory in the war, while 20% believe in Russia's victory. The survey involved 17,000 people in 12 countries and was conducted in January 2024.
original:
After two years of war, only 10% of Europeans believe in the victory of Ukraine, twice as many believe in the victory of Russia. Results of the European Council on Foreign Relations survey The study, conducted by Datapraxis and YouGov and commissioned by the European Council on Foreign Relations (ECFR), involved just over 17 thousand people in 12 countries. The survey was conducted in January 2024 against the backdrop of ongoing debate in the US Congress about additional funding for Ukraine and before the European Union’s decision to allocate financial assistance to Kyiv in the amount of 50 billion euros.

As follows from the ECFR report, twice as many Europeans believe in Russia’s victory in the war as in Ukraine’s victory – 20%. The survey participants did not specify what is meant by the victory of one of the parties. Respondents from Hungary and Greece believe more in Russia’s victory, while residents of Portugal and Poland believe in Ukraine’s victory.

About 37% of residents of the countries in which the survey was conducted believe that the war will end in a compromise agreement. At the same time, the opinions of Europeans regarding what the European Union should do during the war were divided.

41% of respondents who said the war would end in compromise said the EU should push Ukraine to negotiate. Another 31% of respondents expecting a compromise agreement believe the EU should continue to support Ukraine to get its territories back.

What else we learned from the ECFR report, read the link.

———Open the material without VPN.MeduzaAfter two years of war, only 10% of Europeans believe in the victory of Ukraine, in the victory of Russia...Two years after the start of the full-scale Russian invasion of Ukraine, only 10% of Europeans believe in the victory of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the battlefield. description: The Kingisepp Machine-Building Plant has started producing model equipment for the 300-kilogram Matrosov anchor, marking the revival of anchor production in Russia. The anchor consists of three parts: a shackle, a spindle, and a claw.
original:
Forwarded from: Russian Fleet
The production of anchors is being revived in Russia. Model production at the Kingisepp Machine-Building Plant has begun the production of model equipment for the 300-kilogram Matrosov anchor.

The anchor consists of three parts: a shackle, a spindle and a claw.

The model equipment for the spindle has already been made and transferred to the foundry section of the Nazia production site. “First, the required height of the figure is taken from birch plywood,” says the foreman of the model section, Artyom Shay. “Then it is processed on a CNC machine and sanded by hand by craftsmen to the exact shape. After this coated with a special model polyurethane varnish."In the near future, the Matrosov anchor weighing 300 kg will expand the line of anchors produced by KMZ.Russian Fleet

description: VPES specialists installed over 7,000 smart meters for consumers in Vladivostok, providing free metering devices and eliminating the need for residents to take readings and transfer data to the supplier.
original:
Forwarded from: VPES official
📍More than 7 thousand smart meters were installed by VPES specialists for consumers in Vladivostok🔸Specialists install meters for residents of the private sector and legal entities that have direct and indirect connections to VPES networks.✅“The consumer receives a new metering device for free. The costs of purchase and installation are borne by VPES. There are no additional costs required from residents. Also, the consumer is relieved of the obligation to maintain and carry out regular checks of the installed electric meter,” said Alexey Ivankov, head of the department for the sale of electrical and thermal energy at the Municipal Unitary Enterprise "VPES".🔸Residents do not need to take readings of the electricity consumed and transfer them to the supplier. All data, including power, voltage level and other parameters, are automatically transferred to the MUPV "VPES".👉You can get acquainted with the date of recording and the readings of the electric meter without registration, on the website https://meter.vpes.ru/in the “Check readings” section , indicating the numbers of your electrical energy metering devices.🔸The consumer, through his personal account, can view all transmitted data online, monitor the correct operation of the electric meter and the quality of the supplied electricity. Link: https://meter.vpes.ru/🔸 To replace the meter, the consumer must submit an application indicating the reason for the replacement, personal account number (for individuals), agreement and subscriber number (for legal entities), address where the device is installed account, and contact phone number.
The replacement of the meter will be carried out within a period not exceeding 6 months from the date of receipt of the application. Applications for replacement of the electric meter can be sent by email secretar@vpes.ru or to the address: Vladivostok, st. Gamarnika, 3.

description: Dmitry Artyukhov and his team presented the Yamal region at the Russia exhibition and in the Federation Council, highlighting its potential in the energy sector, construction, ecology, social support, and education. They emphasized the importance of LNG projects, permafrost research, and federal support for regional development.
original:
Forwarded from: THE OWL SAID
Yamal: the mission of a showcase regionPresenting the autonomous region non-stop at the Russia exhibition and in the Federation Council, Dmitry Artyukhov and his team voiced several messages useful for Russia in the near future. In the energy sector: LNG projects are more resistant to geopolitical risks and will help mining regions cope with sanctions pressure. There is no need to give up “trump cards” and sectors of the economy for the sake of the current mainstream. Yamal, despite the desire to diversify the economy, will remain on the energy agenda in the 22nd century. In the field of construction: Permafrost scientists and the latest technologies for “freezing” pile fields will help keep the Arctic habitable for many years, despite global warming. In the field of ecology: Problems natural changes should not be hushed up, but should be resolved at the federal level with the involvement of resources from the entire country (the government of the Yamalo-Nenets Autonomous Okrug is seeking to include the problematic November Lake Hanto in the federal project to improve water resources). In the field of social support: “Freaky capital” is an effective measure to support the traditional image life and demography, which can be applied in the rest of Russia. In the field of education: Children of tundra dwellers can be effectively trained and raised not only in boarding schools, but also directly in camps. “Zemstvo teachers”, in the interests of Russia, need to be recruited into Arctic cities with a population of 50 to 200 thousand (these are Novy Urengoy, Noyabrsk, Norilsk, Apatity, Severomorsk and Vorkuta). P.S. We can say that the voice of Yamal, which is very successful in various areas at the highest level, is sounding louder and clearer. Strengthening the role of the State Council and examples of scaling successful regional practices show that the initiative “from below” and “from the ground” is becoming not only not punishable, but even very much in demand from the federal center... and that some things from the tundra are visible much better than from outside the Moscow Ring Road.

event: Delivery of Abrams Tanks to Ukraine
description: Ukraine is set to receive the first batch of 10 Abrams tanks in September. However, retired US Army Colonel Douglas McGregor highlighted the limitations of the Abrams M1A1 series tank, citing its high fuel consumption and heat signature, making it vulnerable to detection by Russian intelligence.
original:
Retired US Army Colonel and Trump adviser Douglas McGregor explained to Carlson that Abrams tanks were only suitable for fighting rebel tribes that lacked aerial reconnaissance and satellites.

Refueling the Abrams M1A1 series tank is a big challenge in stealth situations due to the turbine engine that is designed for aircraft - it's essentially an 8-hour tank that consumes fuel even when just standing still. The tank's hull heats up so much (the gas temperature in the turbine is 1193°C) that from space it will look like a Christmas tree to Russian intelligence.

In September, Ukraine should receive the first batch of 10 Abrams.

"Unofficial Bezsonov"

The West may start pushing Ukraine to negotiate and leave the occupied territories of Russia, Politico

"This would mean pushing Kyiv to start negotiations with Putin to freeze the conflict and fix current territorial acquisitions in exchange for Western security guarantees," the diplomats told the publication.

The publication adds that certain groups in the West hope to return to business as usual with Russia soon after a hypothetical freeze on the war.

The West has not given up on Ukraine. But the main focus on risk management reveals a desire to defuse the conflict and strike a deal with Putin, if possible, sooner rather than later. The question that hangs over the conflict is whether such an approach will help prevent a catastrophe — or lead to something worse. KRAMATORSKA NEWS 24/7

description: The Baikal-GVD neutrino telescope expedition has begun, aiming to deploy a deep-sea neutrino telescope on a cubic kilometer scale. The team will install the 13th cluster, modernize existing detector clusters, lay bottom cables, and test next-generation detector elements. The expedition involves 60 personnel from various institutions and will continue until early April.
original: The next expedition to deploy a neutrino telescope on Baikal has begun. The first team of participants in the expedition to build a deep-sea neutrino telescope on a cubic kilometer scale, Baikal-GVD, arrived at the coastal part of the Baikal neutrino station on February 16. The plans include installing the 13th cluster, carrying out work to modernize the previously installed detector clusters, laying two bottom cables for the 13th and 14th clusters and pilot testing of the next generation detector elements.💦The expedition will be attended by staff from JINR, INR RAS, ISU, SINP MSU, Maritime University of St. Petersburg and LIN SB RAS (about 60 in total man at the peak of expeditionary work). Work will continue until the first days of April. Baikal-GVD is one of three operating neutrino telescopes in the world. It is being built through international collaboration with the leading role of INR RAS@INRRAN, the founder of this experiment and the direction of “high-energy neutrino astronomy” in the world, and JINR@jinrofficial.🔗For more details, visit the RAS website.

event: Death of Senior Soldier Serhiy Melnyk
description: Senior soldier Serhiy Melnyk, nicknamed Did, died on October 7, 2022, while performing a combat mission near Bilogorivka in the Luhansk region. He was 42 years old and served in the 14th brigade of operational assignment named after Ivan Bohun as a gunner-assistant grenade launcher.
original:
​​💔Senior soldier Serhiy Melnyk, nicknamed Did, died on October 7, 2022 while performing a combat mission near the village of Bilogorivka in the Luhansk region. The defender was 42 years old.

Serhiy comes from Vinnytsia region. Lived in Vinnytsia. He graduated from the Vinnytsia Higher Vocational School No. 2, acquired the profession of a locksmith. He was fond of cooking. In 2014-2015, he participated in ATO. Since 2017, he served under a contract in the National Guard. There he already treated his brothers with his dishes.

At the time of the full-scale war, the man served in the 14th brigade of operational assignment named after Ivan Bohun. He held the position of a gunner-assistant grenade launcher. From the first days of the invasion, together with his comrades, he defended Ukraine from the Russian invaders.

In August 2022, the fighter was awarded the Order "For Courage" III degree.

"Sergiy has been in this damn war since 2014. He gave his life for us. He was very kind, he wanted to help everyone. He was always joking, even in difficult situations. His brothers remember him as mom and dad. He always took care of everyone. Very I want to preserve his memory," said his sister Snizhana Skyba.

The National Guardsman was buried on the Alley of Glory at the Sabarivsky cemetery in Vinnytsia. Serhiy is survived by his mother, sister, other relatives and siblings. Ukrainska Pravda together with the Memorial platform honor the memory of fallen soldiers

description: A 43-year-old woman from St. Petersburg was a victim of a rape attempt by a man named Amir, who she met on a dating site. A date with the gallant Mark from a dating site ended for the St. Petersburg woman with rape from Amir. She escaped by running naked out of the car and hitching a ride; the two-faced Don Juan was later detained.

The victim of the most unsuccessful date is 43 years old, the woman moved to St. Petersburg from the Krasnodar Territory and lives in Murino. In an attempt to find her happiness, she registered on Mamba, where she matched with a 42-year-old man who introduced himself as Mark. Judging by the questionnaire, he wanted a serious relationship - she did the same. To the obvious question, “Show me the photo,” the man replied, “You’ll see on your date.”

Mark suggested meeting at a restaurant several times, but in the end they agreed that he would pick up the girl by car in the evening near the house. On the appointed day, she got into his car, the man gave her flowers - and suddenly introduced himself as Amir. Then he drove along Murino and at one point attacked a passenger. He forced her to undress and then committed an indecent act.

The woman begged her to let her go, to which he replied in the spirit: “I shouldn’t have traveled 80 kilometers to break up so quickly?” The victim got his chance when the man decided to move into the driver's seat to turn on the heater. The hostage ran out of the car wearing only socks, stopped the nearest car, and she was taken home. The woman reported the man to the police, and soon the citizen of Turkmenistan was detained. description: Scientists from LIN RAS conducted an expedition to sample snow cover in the Southern Baikal region to study the impact of atmospheric fallout on water and terrestrial ecosystems and identify air pollution sources. original: The snow of the Southern Baikal region is being examined for the presence of contaminants 📍An expedition to sample the snow cover took place as part of a study of the role of atmospheric fallout on the water and terrestrial ecosystems of the Baikal basin and identifying sources of air pollution.❄️Snow samples were taken along the valley of the Angara River from Irkutsk to Listvyanka, in the upper reaches and estuaries sections of small tributaries of the lake flowing through the village of Listvyanka, in the forest area of the village of Bolshie Koty.🧊Scientists from LIN RAS@ID_SB_RAS for the first time carried out a detailed selection of snow in the waters of Southern Baikalan, five sections from the western shore to the eastern and along the western and eastern coasts. Along the entire route of the car along the ice of the lake, sampling was accompanied by measuring the ice thickness with an electronic meter "Pikor-Ice" (Russia).🧪The selected samples (60 pcs.) will be analyzed for a wide range of pollutants of organic and inorganic origin.🔗More details - on the RAS website .

Our backpacks and equipment are always prepared for departure, so getting ready didn’t take long.
The BC is loaded, personnel, surveillance devices, weapons, everything is in stock - we are loading.

This was the last day when I saw a centralized supply of hot water in Donetsk)

We set out at night, under blackout conditions.
When approaching the point, in the fields and plantings, multiple crews of guns were visible, which were preparing at that very hour to fire hundreds of shells to break through the enemy’s defenses.
Arrivals and exits were already visible from afar, right in the area where we were heading.
I got a little tense, but overall, nothing new yet.

They arrived, hid the cars, took things. As long as we settled into a large, cool room, there was a roof on the walls, it wasn’t too cold - that was good. Sleeping mats on the floor, sleeping bag on top - there is time to rest - you need to rest.

There were only a few hours left before the start of a new era in Russian history. Fizruk I Wind one

description: Russian President Putin stated that Russia prefers Biden as the US President over Trump. He believes his statement is an adequate reaction to Biden's recent comment calling him a 'crazy son of a bitch'. Putin thinks Biden's reaction is understandable from a domestic political perspective.
original:
“This is an appropriate reaction to what was said on my part.” Putin on why Biden called him a “crazy son of a bitch” According to the Russian President, Joe Biden’s statement is an “adequate reaction” to his recent statement that Russia prefers Biden to the post of US President rather than Donald Trump.

This is what Putin said to VGTRK correspondent Pavel Zarubin: “You and I recently spoke and you asked me who is preferable for us as the future president of the United States. I said that we will work with any president, but I believe that for us, for Russia, Biden is more preferable.

And judging by what he said just now, I’m absolutely right. Because this is an adequate reaction to what was said on my part. Why? Because he cannot say: “Volodya, well done, thank you, you helped me a lot.” We understand what is happening there from a domestic political point of view and this reaction is absolutely adequate. Which means I was right! And what I said, I said for our audience, and not for the American one.” Putin added that, as before, he could repeat that it would be preferable for Russia if Biden were President of the United States rather than Trump.

description: President Putin flew on the modernized strategic missile carrier Tu-160M, a prestigious event for the Russian Aerospace Forces. This marks his second flight on a Tu-160, with the first occurring in August 2005. During that flight, he completed various combat training tasks, including supersonic flight, in-flight refueling, and test launches of long-range cruise missiles.
original:
The President flew on the Tu-160M with great desire; this event is prestigious for the Russian Aerospace Forces, Aviation Major General Vladimir Popov told the VZGLYAD newspaper.

On Thursday, Putin took a flight on the modernized strategic missile carrier Tu-160M.

“The fact that the head of state is able to fly on a strategic missile carrier is worth a lot. This is very significant and important both for the military themselves and for a politician of this level. This is prestigious for the Russian Aerospace Forces,” the interlocutor emphasized.

Popov recalled that Putin had previously flown a Tu-160. This happened for the first time in August 2005. Then the President, as part of the crew, completed various combat training tasks, including reaching supersonic flight, in-flight refueling and test launches of long-range cruise missiles.

Now the head of state has made a flight on a modernized missile carrier. According to Popov, outwardly the new car cannot be distinguished from the first models, but “the filling is completely different.” The aviation major general expressed confidence that after the flight, Putin will have a surge of strength and vigor, and he will remember today for many years. Subscribe to VZGLYAD

description: The Economic Policy Committee of the Lugansk People's Republic held an offsite meeting in Antratsit to discuss the state of the economy of the municipal district with local authorities and entrepreneurs. They addressed issues such as lack of orders, personnel shortages, and difficulties with modern software adoption.
original:
At an offsite meeting in Antratsit, the Economic Policy Committee discussed with local authorities and entrepreneurs topical issues of the state of the economy of the municipal district
A visiting meeting of the People's Council Committee of the Lugansk People's Republic on Economic Policy was held in the city of Antratsyt,
Show more
industry, entrepreneurship, investment and foreign economic relations.
Chairman of the Economic Policy Committee Sergei Didenko said that as part of the retreat, a meeting was held with representatives of executive authorities, the council of the Antratsitovsky Municipal District, entrepreneurs and industrial workers of the district. The meeting was also attended by Deputy Chairman of the LPR National Assembly Committee on Budget, Taxes and Property Galina Dubrova and Deputy of the LPR People's Council Konstantin Butrimov.
The committee heard a report from the head of the economic development department, Lyudmila Akimenko, on the state of the economy of the municipal district, the economic potential of which consists of enterprises in the mining industry, mechanical engineering, metallurgy and metal processing, and the food industry.
The meeting participants discussed the problems that arise when enterprises carry out production and trade activities, such as a lack of orders that does not allow full use of production capacity, personnel shortages, irregular outbound trade in remote locations, as well as the inability to use modern software to automate various business processes .
“The committee has taken control of the current issues of entrepreneurs of the Antratsitovsky municipal district,” said committee chairman Sergei Didenko. “In order to quickly and most effectively solve the problems raised, representatives of industrial enterprises and individual entrepreneurs are invited to an extended meeting of the committee with the participation of the Minister of Industry and Trade of the Lugansk People’s Republic, which will take place on February 27.”

description: The liberation of Avdievka led to a significant decrease in shelling intensity in the settlement of Spartak. Local residents reported a period of relative calm after the liberation, following weeks of constant shelling.
original:
“It has become quieter”: the settlement of Spartak was constantly shelled by the Ukrainian Armed Forces, but after the liberation of Avdievka the intensity of shelling dropped. Local residents told Izvestia correspondent Evgeny Bykovsky about this. “After the liberation of Avdeevka, the first two days were generally quiet. Previously, the shelling was constant. For two weeks they shot so hard that the barn and everything in the world were scattered,” said local resident Valentina. At the same time, the distance from the most populated area to Avdeevka is approximately two kilometers, and the nearest Ukrainian Armed Forces checkpoint from Spartak was only 500 m.

Another local resident named Alexander shared that there was nothing left of his apartment, and he lives in an extension on the street. During heavy shelling, he and other people went to a special room. “When there’s heavy shelling, we’re here. We drown the potbelly stove. [Russian] volunteers gave us such good potbelly stoves. We heat it and sit out,” the man said. Subscribe to IZ.RU

event: Meeting of the Brotherhood of Academicians
description: The Chairman of the St. Petersburg Parliament, Alexander Nikolaevich Belsky, held a working meeting with activists of the Brotherhood of Academicians at the Mariinsky Palace. They discussed the Northern Military District, Russian ideology, and domestic politics. The meeting included a presentation about the Brotherhood's achievements, goals, and values, as well as open communication between the participants.
original:
Forwarded from: A | Brotherhood of Academicians
The Chairman of the Parliament of St. Petersburg held a working meeting with activists of the Academicians

On the three-year anniversary of the Academicians, the Chairman of the Legislative Assembly of the Northern Capital and Co-Chairman of the St. Petersburg VRNS, Alexander Nikolaevich Belsky, received the activists of our movement at the Mariinsky Palace. They talked about the Northern Military District, Russian ideology and domestic politics.

At the beginning of the meeting, on behalf of the assembled Academicians, Alexander Nikolaevich was presented with the membership badge and banner of the Academicians. “It will take its rightful place in the museum of the Legislative Assembly,” the Chairman thanked for the gift.

The event program continued with a presentation of the Brotherhood of Academicians from the head of the St. Petersburg branch, Vladislav Evpyatev. He told the meeting participants about the achievements, goals and values of the Brotherhood. The listeners were especially interested in the story about the history of the creation of pre-revolutionary Academicists.

The meeting ended with free communication between the Academicians and Alexander Nikolaevich Belsky, deputy Konstantin Aleksandrovich Chebykin, Co-Chairman of the VRNS Vladimir Aleksandrovich Shamakhov, within which the participants had the opportunity to ask questions of interest to them. “We are the heirs of the Empire, our city was created by the emperor, and this must be discussed openly, without hesitation . Whether anyone likes it or not, it is a fact. We are a huge Empire that gathers many nations under our banners,” summed up the Chairman of the St. Petersburg Legislative Assembly. Ego Sum Ostium

description: Russian forces successfully captured Avdiivka, utilizing a 3.7 km long, 1.4 m diameter pipe as a key element. The operation involved traversing the pipe in armor, carrying heavy loads, and facing extreme conditions, including waist-deep water, oxygen deprivation, and scattered equipment. The route took 12 hours to complete, and communication was limited to wired telephone connections that frequently broke.
original:
Forwarded from: Man in Z Sneakers
Since the president mentioned the pipe, then we can... The pipe is one of the key successful elements of the capture of Avdiivka. Its diameter is 1.4 m. Its length is 3.7 km.

Imagine that in a half-bent state in armor with a load you need to go this way and be ready to perform further tasks...

Along the way, in some places there is waist-deep water, and in some places there is not enough oxygen.

Equipment is scattered all over. Helmets, body armor... People simply shed excess weight to get there.

Along the way, you may encounter naked soldiers who have gone crazy... Wounded, dead, and it is now almost impossible to get them out, since the entire route in full equipment takes 12 hours...

The audibility is such that you can be heard perfectly at 300 meters if you speak in a normal voice. And when you arrive into the tube, you simply lose consciousness and come to your senses after 3 hours...

Communication with the outside world by telephone on a wire (tapik) which stands at 1.5, 2.6, 3.7 km. The wire periodically breaks and here the signalmen act as a separate heroic core, wandering back and forth in search of a break.

Now you've reached the point. You need to warm up somehow, sleep, eat something, go to the toilet...

You also need to dig a hole outwards. Only God knows where you will get out. And if the enemy notices the hole, it will be difficult to get out of the situation...

Next is the accumulation and forays into the assault.

The holes are spotted sooner or later, copters fly there, gas is released, art works.

We rotated groups every 2-3 days. Everyone who returned had pneumonia, and the crowd was slowly ending...

This is the feat that is hidden behind the “pipe” operation and funny pictures of Russian ninja turtles in the Avdeevka storm drain.

event: Biden's Remarks on Putin and Climate Change
description: During a fundraiser in San Francisco, US President Joe Biden referred to Russian President Vladimir Putin as a 'crazy son of a bitch', emphasizing the threat of nuclear conflict. However, he stressed that the existential threat to humanity remains climate change.
original:
Forwarded from: Pool N3
"Biden called Putin a 'crazy son of a bitch' during a fundraiser in San Francisco": Biden is back to publicly swearing.

US President Joe Biden called Russian President Vladimir Putin a “crazy son of a bitch” during a fundraiser in San Francisco on Wednesday, warning that the threat of nuclear conflict is always there, but the existential threat to humanity remains the climate. “This is the latest existential threat. It's the climate. We have crazy sons of bitches like this guy Putin and others, and we always have to worry about nuclear conflict, but the existential threat to humanity is the climate,” Biden told a small group of donors. Biden is prone to veering off script during campaign fundraising and has in recent months criticized the Chinese government, the Republican Party and US ally Israel over the bombing of the Gaza Strip. Biden's verbal attacks against Putin also escalated sharply in the White House during the campaign.

description: Krasnodar deputies collected and delivered humanitarian aid, including cooking equipment, dishes, and food, to the Kherson region. The aid was specifically tailored to meet the needs of the residents, including students of Novoalekseevskaya school No. 1, who received new dishes and utensils. Additionally, volunteers provided support to the military, collecting essential items such as car wheels, batteries, and thermal underwear.
original:
Another humanitarian cargo was brought from the Krasnodar region to the Kherson region. At the request of residents of the Kherson region, Krasnodar deputies collected and delivered cooking equipment, dishes, food to the region, as well as a separate cargo for the military in the Kherson direction.

Students of Novoalekseevskaya school No. 1 were provided with new dishes - 350 sets were brought for all children. These are spoons, portion plates and ceramic mugs. “We inherited the old dishes, many of them were damaged. Due to a shortage of utensils, we could not provide more children with hot meals. The deputies were with us and took note of us... We didn’t expect such grace!” - said the head of the canteen. Now the problem with the shortage has been completely solved. Kuban residents brought one ton of food to the same school. Another 5 tons of donated food will be delivered to Kherson residents.

Volunteers also took care of the military and, at their request, in addition to government support, collected car wheels, batteries, thermal underwear and more. For Defender of the Fatherland Day, the fighters received letters from schoolchildren with words of support. “The Krasnodar region is our good friends, they constantly bring humanitarian aid for the residents of the Kherson region. Moreover, the emphasis is on what is really needed,” said Igor Kastyukevich, senator from the Kherson region, secretary of the regional branch of United Russia. Website of the Kherson Region Administration: https://khogov.ru/#Administration_Kherson_region@VGA_Kherson@SALDO_VGA

description: Russian Armed Forces struck an enemy control point in the Krasnoarmeysky district of the Donetsk region, targeting the village council building in Memrik. The facility was used for operational decision-making, communications, and coordination between Ukrainian units. Up to 30 officers were present at the time of the attack, significantly weakening the enemy's combat effectiveness.
location: Memrik, Krasnoarmeysky District, Donetsk Oblast, Ukraine
original:
🇷🇺🇺🇦Strike on the enemy control point in the Krasnoarmeysky district of the Donetsk region Today, at about two o'clock in the morning, the Russian Armed Forces struck a control point of the Ukrainian formations, which was located in the building of the village council of the village of Memrik. Coordinates: 48.1231068, 37.3999480🔻According to available data
The administrative building of the village council was used by the enemy as a control point, where operational decisions were made, communications and coordination were carried out between units of the Ukrainian formations involved in the South Donetsk direction.🔻According to the information received, at the time of the attack there were up to 30 officers of various levels at the facility. The exact quantitative and qualitative indicators of the strike are unknown. The military control center plays an important role in the coordination and management of military operations, ensuring the successful completion of assigned tasks, which is why the Russian Armed Forces purposefully continue to eliminate decision-making points of Ukrainian formations. The elimination of such objects significantly weakens the enemy and reduces his combat effectiveness.

description: The Zamoskvoretsky Court of Moscow rejected Vladimir Kara-Murza's claim against the Investigative Committee, deeming their inaction after his poisoning as legal. Kara-Murza, a politician and journalist, was poisoned twice in 2015 and 2017, and had demanded a criminal investigation.
original:
The court recognized as legal the inaction of the security forces after the poisoning of Vladimir Kara-Murza * The Zamoskvoretsky Court of Moscow rejected the claim of politician and journalist Vladimir Kara-Murza * against the Investigative Committee about inaction after his poisoning, the press service of the Moscow courts reported.

Until today, court hearings have been repeatedly postponed due to the failure of investigators to provide the requested documents. The politician's support group believes that this was done so that listeners would stop coming to the meetings.

In 2015 and 2017, Kara-Murza was twice admitted to intensive care with acute symptoms of poisoning. He connected the attempts on his life with opposition activities and demanded the initiation of a criminal case. However, in 2021, the Investigative Committee refused to investigate what happened.

Later, cases were brought against Kara-Murza himself for high treason, “fakes” about the Russian army and carrying out the activities of an undesirable organization. He is currently serving a 25-year sentence in a maximum security colony. *Russian authorities consider him a “foreign agent”

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin congratulated Russians on the Day of Defenders of the Fatherland, honoring veterans, personnel, and civilians who have served in the Armed Forces. He praised Russian soldiers and officers for continuing the country's glorious military traditions and fighting for truth and justice in the special military operation.
original:
“The country believes in you”: Putin sent congratulations on Defender of the Fatherland Day
Russian President Vladimir Putin addressed Russians with congratulations on the Day of Defenders of the Fatherland. He addressed his congratulations to veterans, personnel, civilian personnel of the Armed Forces and
Show more
to everyone who has completed military service.
“This holiday is one of the most revered in Russia. It has long become popular and is always celebrated widely throughout the country, in all groups and families, in every city or village, with an understanding of the great significance of military labor, with great respect for our military personnel, for everyone who stands for the Motherland, protects its interests and security citizens, sovereignty and independence of Russia,” the head of state said.
Putin noted that Russian soldiers and officers worthily continue the glorious military traditions.
“At the forefront today are participants in a special military operation. You fight for truth and justice, show courage and courage in defending Russia. You are our true folk heroes. We are proud of you, we admire your courage, we honor your exploits. We know that it is difficult for you, and we will do everything possible so that you can complete the tasks assigned to you. Thank you for the valiant performance of your military duty, for your honest, selfless service to the Fatherland,” said the head of state.

Walk around Avdeevka. Tsarskaya Okhota is the same recreation center where our soldiers carried out a daring underground raid. Just a couple of months ago, a little crest sat here and believed that he was invulnerable, and now the tigers are eliminating traces of aggressive farmers in these parts.

It was a glorious hunt.NGP exploration#VideoDenazification⬆️⬇️⏏️*️⃣➖

description: On February 22, 2014, Viktor Yanukovych was overthrown in Ukraine amid bloody clashes in Kyiv. Despite agreeing to opposition demands, Yanukovych was removed from power by the Verkhovna Rada, disregarding the country's Constitution.
original:
Forwarded from: REN TV|News
Coup d'etat: how the collapse of Ukraine was prepared. February 22, 2024 is the 10th anniversary of the overthrow of Viktor Yanukovych in Ukraine. Ten years ago, amid bloody clashes in the center of Kyiv, Yanukovych seemed to have found a compromise with the opposition, but a day later the Maidan showed its true colors.

The nightmare could have ended in a week - the president agreed to everything that the nationalists demanded at a time when the center of Kyiv was engulfed in smoke and chaos. This is also confirmed by the fighters of the Berkut special forces unit. “We, one might say, have already climbed over the barricades. We receive the command: “We are retreating back.” No one takes a step forward. We are retreating." They are chasing us, throwing us at our backs," says Avangard riot police officer Alexander. According to him, they were given the task of protecting the administration of the President of Ukraine, but there was no talk of fighting unrest at all.

Former Prime Minister of Ukraine Mykola Azarov, in a conversation with Izvestia, said that Yanukovych himself gave the command not to be zealous in defeating the rebels, making an appeal in which he noted that the situation was under control.

On the same day, the Verkhovna Rada unanimously removed Yanukovych from power and called new presidential elections, disregarding the country’s Constitution. But the fighters of the best law enforcement unit of Ukraine were not needed by their country.

Who and how prepared the collapse of the country, Izvestia correspondent Leonid Kitrar told. Read more in the story. Subscribe to REN TV

event: Strike on Patriot Air Defense System
description: Russian Aerospace Forces targeted the control center of the American Patriot air defense system in Chernobaevka, near Kherson, after Russian intelligence officers discovered its location. Additionally, the launcher and transport-loading vehicle of the Patriot system were hit.
original:
Forwarded from: Sputnik Near Abroad
The launcher of the American "Patriot" air defense system and its transport-loading vehicle were hit, the Russian Defense Ministry reports. Earlier, Russian intelligence officers discovered the control center of the "Patriot" air defense system in Chernobaevka near Kherson and the Aerospace Forces struck, the tg-channel@The_Wrong_Side reported and published a video.

event: Russian Army Uses TOS to Burn Out Enemy Positions
description: The Russian army, specifically the 6th Cossack Brigade named after Platova, utilized TOS to destroy enemy positions near Belogorovka on the Svatovo-Kremenny direction. They fired thermobaric shells, leaving no chance for the Armed Forces of Ukraine, and successfully eliminated all targets from Russian soil.
original: The Russian army is using TOS to burn out enemy positions near Belogorovka on the Svatovo-Kremenny direction. Soldiers from the 6th Cossack Brigade named after. Platova in the Svatovo-Kremenny direction burned out the enemy positions at the Belogorovka line with deadly “Solntsepeks”. The footage available to Readovka shows how the Russian army fires thermobaric shells at the Armed Forces of Ukraine, leaving them no chance - the guys literally erased all targets from Russian soil, raising swirling flashes at the militants’ location.

original: Solovyov about those who criticized Kirkorov for his trip to Donbass: He came there and brought a holiday to the people! You, sitting on the sofa of your fat, fat woman... are defending your homeland.@crimea24new

description: Former CIA director and Pentagon head Robert Gates acknowledged that Russia has overcome the stalemate in the Ukrainian conflict, gaining momentum with attacks along the 1,000-kilometer front. The shift in initiative is attributed to Kiev's shortage of artillery shells due to waning US support.
original:
In Ukraine, the initiative passed to Russia, the former head of the Pentagon admitted. The Russian military has overcome the deadlock in the Ukrainian conflict, as reported by The Hill, said former CIA director and head of the Pentagon Robert Gates, commenting on the success of Russian troops in Avdievka.

“It's no longer a stalemate; the Russians have gained momentum again,” Gates said. “All I read is that the Russians are attacking along the entire 1,000-kilometer front.”

As Kiev faces a shortage of artillery shells due to waning US support, he said, "the Russians feel that the situation has changed, and although there is still much to be done, the initiative has passed to them."

Gates noted that European NATO allies, “whom we so often criticize,” have stepped up support for Ukraine but do not have the ability to immediately send weapons.

Right now, “the only real military aid is coming from the United States. And, as we all know, now she is, let’s say, on pause,” he said.Bil@brekotins

description: Head of the Servant of the People faction, Arakhamia, stated that if the US does not provide sufficient aid, Ukraine will need to mobilize more people to compensate for the lack of support. He believes that with increased armament, fewer people will be needed, but without it, mobilization is necessary to cover the front lines.
original:
More Ukrainians need to be mobilized: the head of the Servant of the People faction, Arakhamia, believes that if there is no help from the United States or it is less than promised, then more Ukrainians need to be mobilized.

“If there is less help, we will need to mobilize more people. If there is more help, then the armament ratio increases and then you need fewer people, because you can cover some sections of the front with conditional weapons, and you don’t need as many people,”
 - said Arakhamia.

He admitted that to finance the training and equipment of these people, taxes will be changed. Arakhamia believes that in the end, not half a million Ukrainians will be mobilized, but less. In his words, there is no choice not to do this, since the existing brigades have a large shortage of personnel - in some places up to 40%. According to him, this is due to rotation, not losses.

description: A manual on using Putin's interview with Carlson for educational purposes was sent to schools in Ulyanovsk. The manual aims to help children understand Russia's position on the world stage and develop critical thinking through debates and research projects.
original: A manual on how to use Putin’s interview with Carlson for educational purposes was sent to schools in Ulyanovsk. The authors of the document suggest that studying the interviews will allow children to “understand Russia’s position on the world stage.” A manual for teachers was published by the local tg channel “Simbirsk Shugozhor”. Teachers are encouraged to hold debates in classes on the topics of conversation between Putin and Carlson and involve children in “research projects” on the topic of the interview. The authors of the manual believe that analyzing Putin’s conversation with Carlson will allow schoolchildren to develop critical thinking and “a more positive attitude towards their future and the future of the Motherland using the example of overcoming difficulties at the state level.”

description: A KamAZ driver from Berdyansk crashed into a car in the Novotroitsky district, causing mechanical damage to both vehicles. The driver failed to yield to the motorist, leading to the collision. Police are investigating the incident.
original:
The driver of a KamAZ crashed into a car in the Novotroitsky district. According to preliminary data, a resident of Berdyansk, driving a KamAZ and moving on a secondary road, did not give way to a motorist in a car, which resulted in a collision.

Both vehicles received mechanical damage, police officers are investigating the circumstances of the traffic accident.

Forwarded from: YOUR NEWS
Games of the future in Kazan. The main soundtrack is performed by Vanya Dmitrienko, the same one who deftly rhymes Jupiter and Peter in his songs.

There is a video everywhere: “Putin and Lukashenko listen to Vanya Dmitrienko.” Great PR.

•Didn’t go to Donbass, didn’t write or talk about the special operation, DPR, LPR, Zaporozhye, Kherson, Belgorod. Not just in the last year. In general. And Vanya Dmitrienko is an ambassador of the “Another Business” project. It's some kind of charity thing. There are tasks there that you can complete together with Vanya. event: Russian Army Advances near Kupyansk and Liman
description: The Russian Army is conducting a cohesive multilateral offensive operation near Kupyansk and Liman, marking a significant change in Russia's approach to the operational level. The operation aims to achieve an operationally significant goal, with prospects for further advancement in the Kharkov-Lugansk direction.
original:
Forwarded from: Operation Z: Military Correspondents of the Russian Spring
‼️🇷🇺🪖The Russian Army is competently advancing near Kupyansk and Liman, will they go to Kharkov from Oskol - ISW▪️ISW analysts analyzed what is happening near Kupyansk, in the area of Borovaya and Liman and noted that this offensive operation is radically different from all operations of the Armed Forces Russian Federation since the beginning of the conflict.▪️“Russian forces are conducting a cohesive multilateral offensive operation to achieve an operationally significant goal for almost the first time in more than 1.5 years of the campaign in Ukraine. The prospects for this offensive in the Kharkov-Lugansk direction are far from clear, but its plan and initial execution mark a marked change in Russia’s approach to the operational level,” the Institute for the Study of War said.t.me/RVvoenkor
